description:
Bal looks for a coach to help him train hard for the WBC Cup. Tetsuya`s Buddy Demon Lord Asmodai takes Bal under his wing and challenges him physically and mentally, culminating in a Buddyfight with Bal and Gao`s partnership at stake.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ヒデェ! 悪魔のコーチ・アスモダイ!!
